section.p: calculates the sampling interval based on the set samplesPerCall, sampleRate, and channel. Sampling interval (in seconds) = samplesPerCall / (sampleRate × channel). Make sure the interval is ≥ 0.01 seconds. The SDK triggers the callback based on this interval.

The SDK calculates the sampling interval based on the samplesPerCall, sampleRate, and channel parameters. Sampling interval (seconds) = samplesPerCall / (sampleRate × channel). Ensure the sampling interval is ≥ 0.01 seconds. The SDK triggers the callback based on the sampling interval.
